title: Opinion: We know how to prevent bird flu. So why aren’t we?
description: Lower egg prices have subdued public discussion about bird flu. But the virus is expected to devastate farms this winter.
content: Lower egg prices have subdued public discussion about bird flu. But the virus is expected to devastate farms this winter.
